comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: May be of play at a tournament in Montclair, NJ. See NYT of Sept 18, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9900E4D7123FE633A... The article has Miss Clare Cassell and McLean winning matches. Perhaps this was a later round.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks swanq. We'll add the information about the location of the tournament next time we update the record.
